series.title: Books of History Chronicles
series.description: The series consists of three sub-series – the Circle series, the Paradise series and the Lost Books series – as well as some connected standalone novels. Ted Dekker's Books of History Chronicles includes: The Circle Series - The Circle Series: Graphic Novels The Paradise Series The Lost Books Series - The Lost Books: Graphic Novels The Books of Mortals as well as a few novels that are not part of a series (besides this one). The author prefers that books in the series remain unnumbered, as he feels that there is no correct order in which to read them. Here, books are grouped by series within the Chronicles.
